| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |

| 9 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( ph -> ( A .- B ) = ( A .- B ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( ph -> ( B .- C ) = ( B .- C ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( ph -> ( C .- A ) = ( C .- A ) ) |
| 12 | 1, 2, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11 | #P_trgcgr | |- ( ph -> <" A B C "> .~ <" A B C "> ) |
